windows.command: npx hardhat run scripts/buildAbi.js ;; npx hardhat run scripts/buildRootAndProofs.js

linux.command: npx hardhat run scripts/buildAbi.js && npx hardhat run scripts/buildRootAndProofs.js

osx.command: npx hardhat run scripts/buildAbi.js && npx hardhat run scripts/buildRootAndProofs.js

windows.command: npm run build ;; npx hardhat test ; forge test

linux.command: npm run build && npx hardhat test && forge test

osx.command: npm run build && npx hardhat test && forge test

windows.command: mkdir -p contractsFlatten ;; npx hardhat flatten > contractsFlatten/Flat.sol ;; npx hardhat flatten contracts/SimpleNft.sol > contractsFlatten/SimpleNftFlat.sol

linux.command: mkdir -p contractsFlatten && npx hardhat flatten > contractsFlatten/Flat.sol && npx hardhat flatten contracts/SimpleNft.sol > contractsFlatten/SimpleNftFlat.sol

osx.command: mkdir -p contractsFlatten && npx hardhat flatten > contractsFlatten/Flat.sol && npx hardhat flatten contracts/SimpleNft.sol > contractsFlatten/SimpleNftFlat.sol
